verses.verse: In the thirty-sixth <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H609>Asa<s%>'s <S%H4438>reign<s%> <S%H1201>Baasha<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5927>came<s%> up <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H1129>fortified<s%> <S%H7414>Ramah<s%> in order to <S%H1115>prevent<s%> <S%H5414><s%> [anyone] from <S%H3318>going<s%> out or <S%H935>coming<s%> in to Asa <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>

Then <S%H609>Asa<s%> <S%H3318>brought<s%> out <S%H3701>silver<s%> and <S%H2091>gold<s%> from the <S%H214>treasuries<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> and the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H7971>sent<s%> them to Ben-hadad king of <S%H758>Aram,<s%> who <S%H3427>lived<s%> in <S%H1834>Damascus,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

"[Let there be] a <S%H1285>treaty<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> you and me, [as] <S%H996>between<s%> my father and your father. <S%H1>Behold,<s%> I have <S%H1>sent<s%> you <S%H2009>silver<s%> and <S%H7971>gold;<s%> <S%H3701>go,<s%> <S%H2091>break<s%> your <S%H1980>treaty<s%> with <S%H6565>Baasha<s%> <S%H1285>king<s%> of <S%H1201>Israel<s%> so that he will <S%H4428>withdraw<s%> from me."

So Ben-hadad <S%H8085>listened<s%> to <S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H609>Asa<s%> and <S%H7971>sent<s%> the <S%H8269>commanders<s%> of his <S%H2428>armies<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and they <S%H5221>conquered<s%> <S%H5859>Ijon,<s%> <S%H1835>Dan,<s%> Abel-maim, and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4543>store<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about when <S%H1201>Baasha<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> [of it] that he <S%H2308>ceased<s%> <S%H1129>fortifying<s%> <S%H7414>Ramah<s%> and <S%H7673>stopped<s%> his <S%H4399>work.<s%>

Then <S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H609>Asa<s%> <S%H3947>brought<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and they <S%H5375>carried<s%> away the <S%H68>stones<s%> of <S%H7414>Ramah<s%> and its <S%H6086>timber<s%> with <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H1201>Baasha<s%> had been <S%H1129>building,<s%> and with them he <S%H1129>fortified<s%> <S%H1387>Geba<s%> and <S%H4709>Mizpah.<s%>

At that <S%H6256>time<s%> <S%H2607>Hanani<s%> the <S%H9536>seer<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H609>Asa<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, "Because you have <S%H8172>relied<s%> on the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H758>Aram<s%> and have not <S%H8172>relied<s%> on the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> the <S%H2428>army<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H758>Aram<s%> has <S%H4422>escaped<s%> out of your <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

"Were not the <S%H3569>Ethiopians<s%> and the <S%H3864>Lubim<s%> an <S%H7230>immense<s%> <S%H2428>army<s%> with <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7235>many<s%> <S%H7393>chariots<s%> and <S%H6571>horsemen<s%>? Yet, because you <S%H8172>relied<s%> on the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> He <S%H5414>delivered<s%> them into your <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

"For the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7751>move<s%> to and <S%H7751>fro<s%> <S%H3605>throughout<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> that He may <S%H2388>strongly<s%> <S%H2388>support<s%> those whose <S%H3824>heart<s%> is <S%H8003>completely<s%> His. You have <S%H5528>acted<s%> <S%H5528>foolishly<s%> in <S%H2088>this.<s%> <S%H3588>Indeed,<s%> from <S%H6258>now<s%> on you will surely <S%H3426>have<s%> <S%H4421>wars.<s%>"

Then <S%H609>Asa<s%> was <S%H3707>angry<s%> with the <S%H9536>seer<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> him in <S%H1004>prison,<s%> <S%H4115><s%> for he was <S%H2197>enraged<s%> at him for <S%H2088>this.<s%> And <S%H609>Asa<s%> <S%H7533>oppressed<s%> <S%H4480>some<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> at the <S%H1931>same<s%> <S%H6256>time.<s%>

And <S%H2009>now,<s%> the <S%H1697>acts<s%> of <S%H609>Asa<s%> from <S%H7223>first<s%> to <S%H314>last,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> they are <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H5612>Book<s%> of the <S%H4428>Kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And in the thirty-ninth <S%H8141>year<s%> of his <S%H4438>reign<s%> <S%H609>Asa<s%> <S%H2456>became<s%> <S%H2456>diseased<s%> in his <S%H7272>feet.<s%> His <S%H2483>disease<s%> was <S%H4605>severe,<s%> yet <S%H1571>even<s%> in his <S%H2483>disease<s%> he did not <S%H1875>seek<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> but the <S%H7495>physicians.<s%>
So <S%H609>Asa<s%> <S%H7901>slept<s%> with his fathers, having <S%H1>died<s%> in the forty-first <S%H4191>year<s%> of his <S%H8141>reign.<s%>

And they <S%H6912>buried<s%> him in his own <S%H6913>tomb<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he had <S%H3738>cut<s%> out for himself in the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> and they <S%H7901>laid<s%> him in the <S%H4904>resting<s%> <S%H4904>place<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he had <S%H4390>filled<s%> with <S%H1314>spices<s%> of various <S%H2177>kinds<s%> <S%H7543>blended<s%> by the perfumers' <S%H4639>art;<s%> and they <S%H8313>made<s%> a <S%H5704>very<s%> <S%H3966><s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8316>fire<s%> for him.
